resources.string:
This is Meter.

Meter's various meters (tap the options menu) are usually intended to be called from a remote activity in an ESM app like Ohmage.

Meter is a project by Phil Adams (philadams.net) and the Interaction Design Lab (idl.cornell.edu).
Please indicate your current pain level with the following seek bar:
Please indicate your current pain level with the following NRS:
Please tap-and-hold the screen to report your current pain level from 0 (no pain) to 100 (worst pain possible):
Please indicate your current pain level with the following seek bar:
Please indicate your current pain level by moving this bar:
Please tap on the image that best represents your current pain level:
Please touch the screen with 1 to 5 fingers to report your current pain intensity level (5 = worst pain ever):
Please tap the screen repeatedly to report your current pain level (0 is no pain, 10 is the worst pain ever):
Please tap or swipe up/down to change the face such that it best represents your current pain level.
